title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 63.3 - Certification of health of swine
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 63.3 - Certification of health of swine

State Regulations

All swine imported or moved into this State for any purpose
other than immediate slaughter shall be accompanied by an approved health
certificate issued within 30 days prior to movement. Such certificate shall
indicate the results and dates of all required tests and certifications as
outlined in sections 63.4 and
63.5
of this Part. All swine to be
imported shall be permanently identified by eartag, tattoo or other acceptable
identification. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
63.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
